SELECT qq, name, found, img, six, `sql`, upload from a_admin_user limit 10 offset #{current}
update a_admin_user a set `name` = (SELECT `name` from a_user_found b where a.qq=b.qq); SELECT count(*) as count from a_admin_user
mapper.update: UPDATE a_admin_user SET found = #{found}, img = #{img}, six = #{six}, `sql` = #{sql}, upload = #{upload}, name = (select name from a_user_found where qq = #{qq}) WHERE qq = #{qq}
mapper.insert: INSERT into a_admin_user (qq, found, img, six, `sql`, upload, name) VALUES(md5(#{qq}), #{found}, #{img}, #{six}, #{sql}, #{upload}, (select name from a_user_found where qq = md5(#{qq})))
